taskman.backend.constraint

Interface ConstraintComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndConstraint, Constraint, IfThenConstraint, NotConstraint, OrConstraint

    public interface ConstraintComponent
    Interface representing the constraint component. Note: We apply here the Composite Pattern
    Author:
    Jeroen Van Der Donckt, Alexander Braekevelt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConstraintComponent parseConstraint(java.lang.String string, ResourceManager userManager)
      Returns a constraint from a given string.
      boolean solution(java.util.Map<ResourceType,java.lang.Integer> requirements)
      Returns the solution of testing the constraint with the given requirements.

    • Method Detail

      • solution

        boolean solution(java.util.Map<ResourceType,java.lang.Integer> requirements)
        Returns the solution of testing the constraint with the given requirements.
        Parameters:
        requirements - the requirements
        Returns:
        true if the requirements meet the constraint, otherwise false

      • parseConstraint

        static ConstraintComponent parseConstraint(java.lang.String string,
                                           ResourceManager userManager)
                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                           java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Returns a constraint from a given string.
        Parameters:
        string - a string which represents a constraint.
        userManager - a resource userManager.
        Returns:
        a constraint.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the string does not represent a valid constraint.
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if a number in the string cannot be parsed to an integer.
